The course page will automatically open on the Library, this is where your course content from Nelson Thornes is stored.

  1. Use the + icons to open the tree structure and view the units and chapters
  2. Click on the drop down arrow next to an activity name and select Find out more about this resource for more details.
  3. To launch the resource, just click on the title.

Tip: You can also use the Search option on the Library panel to search for resources.
